Articles.Content:
Complete KSP newbie here. I'm 2 weeks in and stuck on the "Docking" lesson, LOL!

Anywho...is there a way to slow down the mouse pointer, in game, most especially in the Map view? Currently I'm using my system's Control Panel mouse settings to slow the pointer but that, obviously, makes the pointer cumbersome at other times. It would be nice to have the accuracy of a very slow pointer when in map mode and adjusting maneuvers and such but still have a faster pointer at other times?

Just a thought gang. BTW...KSP is awesome!

Vic

That would be operating system specific, I'm guessing - in Windows you should have an acceleration option that helps do large and small movements without being stuck on a speed that's either too fast or too slow.

Also - do you know you can use the mouse wheel to make small adjustments to manoeuvre nodes? That helps a lot. 

Wemb
